ToFixIt.text: Enable CSRF protection by using libraries like Flask-WTF and verifying CSRF tokens on sensitive POST routes.

Doc.what_is_an_issues: The route allows state-changing POST requests without verifying the origin of the request, making it vulnerable to CSRF.
Doc.how_can_i_fix_it: Use CSRF tokens to ensure that form submissions come from legitimate users and not from malicious sites.
